description: This file defines a LightningJS component called 'AuditTrailConsole' that displays an audit trail of recent events, including rendering logic and subscription management to an audit data source.

classes.name: AuditTrailConsole
classes.description: A LightningJS component that displays recent audit trail events with styling and real-time updates.

methods.name: mounted
methods.description: Initializes the component by fetching recent audit events and subscribing to audit updates.

methods.name: destroyed
methods.description: Cleans up by unsubscribing from all audit notifications when the component is destroyed.
